channel.title: G'day Everyone!
channel.description: I'd Just like to say hello and what not. I just recently started cheating agian after finding out how annoying it is to have to make char from scratch because they keep getting locked and the fact that I was able to get scar again. Also I'm 13 ,I'm from Melbourne, Australia and I currently live in Canada. Also I just thought this would be the best place to put this. Just wondering what is Rep and what is it reson for being there?

item.title: G'day Everyone!
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

[quote=“Vipsta, post:4, topic:4541”][quote author=thiefmn6092 link=topic=5922.msg59886#msg59886 date=1152407521]

Rep is short for Reputation. You earn Rep points for every good thing you do. It is awarded by other users. So, for example, if you come out with an auto-updating super duper bot, you would probably get some decent rep.

auto-updating super bot, lmao. Dont ever ask someone to give you rep
[/quote]

Ever heard of sarcasm, Mr. 3 Rep?[/quote]
you have 0 rep and have done shit. He was in the autorune screw so stfu

Read full topic

item.title: G'day Everyone!
item.dc:creator: @Vipsta Vipsta
item.description:
@Vipsta wrote:

[quote=“thiefmn6092, post:8, topic:4541”][quote author=Vipsta link=topic=5922.msg59901#msg59901 date=1152408765]
I don’t want to start a flame war over something so stupid, but the point of my post was that if you did something half decent, or awesome, then you would receive rep for it. I know theres not going to be an auto updating super bot, so you don’t need to point it out to me.
[/quote]

Why exactly are we talking about rep, and i was LAUGHING at it… Is there somthing wrong with that? sigh[/quote]

Oh, opps, I thought you meant “Super bot? J00 are a noob, and you will never get rep”

My bad, sorry dude.

Read full topic
